It's in a different key. But using the same chords, just not in the same order. A variation. Kind of like Am F C G.
http://i182.photobucket.com/albums/x140/thehillcrestapts/Funny%20Shit/I-Sense-Butthurt-75000244666.jpg

Look man, I'm not trying to say I'm better than everyone else. I've written a song that uses a variation of this progression ( C# Dm B F#) I have songs with more complicated progressions though. I was just pointing out that everyone uses the progression as a joke, I'm not trying to make myself look amazing or anything. You should calm down.
EDIT: Oops, I wrote the progression out wrong.
I'm not trashing it because it's uncomplicated. I'm just saying that most people turn to that exact progression and a lot of music is unoriginal due to this.
It's a precision bass.
I'm pretty sure the opening guitar chords were a bit wrong, but still good!
